description: It shows a map where last location of where the user parked its car is shown
There is a list of cars on the top of the screen where user can select the car he wants to see
In the bottom right corner of the screen, user can insert a new location either by its current location or setting a new one
Pressing a car location will display:
- Last person who parked the car
Screen to manage the cars within the group
Any member of the group can add, remove, or edit a car, ensuring that the list stays updated
Each car entry includes details such as the last parked location and the name of the person who parked it
Users can also change the type of car when adding a new one, allowing for better organization
A clear and simple interface makes it easy to switch between different cars and see their latest status
Screen to manage the members of your group
Displays a list of all users in the group, along with their email for easy identification
Any member can update the group name, keeping it relevant for the participants
The group admin has additional controls, allowing them to remove users or promote them to admin
A well-structured layout ensures that managing members and roles is straightforward
